soda.Name: Fizz
soda.Description: An effervescent fruity experience with hints of grape and coriander.

soda.Name: Pop
soda.Description: An explosion of flavor that will knock your socks off!

soda.Name: Cola

soda.Name: Mega Pop
soda.Description: Not for the faint of heart. So flavorful and so invigorating, it should probably be illegal.
